BeamExpander

Contains logic for interacting with the programmable beam expander

Functions
SetSpotSize
call BeamExpander.SetSpotSize(
spotsize
);

Focuses the beam expander on a spot size in inches

Parameters
spotsize

the beam diameter in inches

GetCompValues
call BeamExpander.GetCompValues(
&xCompensation,
&yCompensation,
&zCompensation
);

Gets the beam expander compensation values for the X, Y and Z axis in inches.

Response Parameters
&xCompensation

the x compensation in inches

&yCompensation

the y compensation in inches

&zCompensation

the z compensation in inches
